notes: Words are chunked into multiple JSON files for easier inspection and incremental loading on mobile.
Italian glosses are not present in JMdict; this build ships EN word glosses and multiple-language kanji meanings (EN/ES/FR/PT) from KANJIDIC2.
To produce full Italian word glosses, an additional JP-IT bilingual dictionary source is required (e.g., EDRDG JITALIAN/ITADICT).
